comment.author: 14481705@N04
comment._content: This building is still around; it is the present Parliament Building for Greece's national legislature. It's located on Syntagma square in the center of Athens.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Mosely.Brian: Thanks for the information. We will add it to the source data and reload the description.
